docs.snippet: Hurricane Andrew ravaged thousands of mobile homes in 1992. But changes were made, and Florida’s 850,000 mobile homes seemed to fare better during Irma.

headline.main: Considered Vulnerable, Mobile Homes Are Battered but Largely Intact
